sense.def:
Most of a group or amount
pomeni skoraj vse ali večji del neke skupine ali količine.

seg.quote: I saw most of the early Shirley Temple films.
He used to spend most of his time in the library.

sense.def:
The most
pomeni več kot kdorkoli drug ali karkoli drugega ali največja možna količina.

seg.quote: This is the area that attracts the most attention.
The most I could learn was that Lithgow had been sacked.

sense.def:
Most
ali
the most
pomeni v večji meri ali obsegu kot karkoli drugega.

seg.quote: What he most feared was being left alone.
Which do you value most—wealth or health?

sense.def:
Most
se uporablja pred pridevniki ali prislovi za tvorbo presežnikov.

seg.quote: It was one of the most important discoveries ever made.
These are the works I respond to most strongly.

sense.def:
Most
lahko uporabimo, če želimo poudariti pridevnik ali prislov. Na primer, če rečemo, da je nekaj
most interesting
, to pomeni, da je zelo zanimivo;

seg.quote: The trading results show a most encouraging trend.

sense.def:
Izraz
at most
ali
at the most
uporabljamo, ko navedemo največje mogoče ali verjetno število.

seg.quote: I only have fifteen minutes or twenty minutes at the most.
There would be at most a hundred people listening.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes the most of something
, tisto uporabi ali izkoristi, kolikor je največ mogoče.

seg.quote: Governments should face up to the situation and make the most of it.
